name: Block Dodge (Yawi)
description:
This was my game I made and completed; Block Dodge.

Tutorial by Brackeys

It is a prototype, as I will make more levels, add menus, music and sounds,  more obstacles, etc.

It is a small game that will take approximately 0.5 - 3 minutes or so.

Enjoy my game, I am open to feedback in the comments.
